name: mnist_logistic_regression
desc: Statistical method. that models the relationship between a dependent binary variable and one or more independent variables by fitting a binary logistic curve to the observed data.
label: Logistic Regression that runs on the mnist dataset

y.label: Variable (dependent)
y.desc: A unique nominal variable. The variable is converted to binary by assigning 1 to the positive class and 0 to all other classes.

x.label: Covariates (independent)
x.desc: One or more variables. Can be numerical or nominal. For nominal variables dummy encoding is used.
